headline: Caliche Development Partners Puts The Largest Helium Salt Cavern In The World Into Operation Under A Long-Term Linde Contract
summary: Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) is among the 11 Best Hydrogen Stocks to Invest in Now. Caliche Development Partners has put the world’s largest helium salt cavern into operation at its Golden Triangle Storage project in Beaumont, Texas. The industrial gases company Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) has signed a long-term contract with the cavern, which can store more […]
